system.controller

Class SwingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.model.LVSObject
      • system.controller.SwingController

  • public class SwingController
extends LVSObject
    This class is the controller of the GUI by using Swing. The controller is used to manage and coordinate between all swing component. It also holds the UI representation mode status. Everything that pass from other logic controllers to the GUI must via this controller.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang
